casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the APPEAL OF: KELFORD OWNER, LLC, No. 446P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 Lloyd C. Smith, Jr., Attorney at Law, Jonathan E. Huddleston, Attorney at Law, Lloyd C. Smith, III, Attorney at Law, Windsor, for Bertie County. Charles B. Neely, Jr., Attorney at Law, Nancy S. Rendleman, Attorney at Law, John Holton, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Kelford Owner, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of December 2018 by Bertie County in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
